name: speed
desc: The maximum number of parsecs the ship can move each turn.

name: cost
desc: The number of components needed to build the ship

name: hp
desc: The amount of damage the ship can take.

name: backup-damage
desc: The amount of damage that the ship will do when using it's backup weapon. (IE When it draws a battle round.)

name: primary-damage
desc: The amount of damage that the ship will do when using it's primary weapon. (IE When it wins a battle round.)

name: escape
desc: The chance the ship has of escaping from battle.
